name: jaggy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
rough, with many sharp points: jaggy rocks and slippery seaweed
More examplesFewer examplessplendid sandy bays protected by jaggy outcrops of rock This was Scotland, and to venture out from below one's jaggy blankets was to risk chilblains.By failing to grasp a painful nettle, the Scottish Premier League has been forced to choose between two jaggy thistles.When stretched to this size the text looks very jaggy and rough.
